name: 三和大神
description: 三和大神模拟器，体验三和大神的挂逼生活，日结，上网，黑厂，开宝箱，大水，挂逼烟，挂逼机，瘫痪，海信大酒店，修车。
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium G3260 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Pentium G3260 integrated graphics card Storage: 18 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Pentium G3260 integrated graphics card Storage: 18 MB available space
